title: My Pet Dinosaur
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 42 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: If you had a pet dinosaur, what would you teach it to do? In My Pet Dinosaur, students will be entertained by a boy and all the things his silly pet dinosaur can do. Students will have the opportunity to identify the characters as well as to connect to prior knowledge. Engaging illustrations and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers.
meta: beg, dinosaur, fetch, pet, roar, shake hands
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /d/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word can

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
